mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER.NAME AS name, (SELECT NAME FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE MEMBER.DEPT_NO=DEPARTMENT.NO )AS teamName , (SELECT NAME FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE MEMBER.TEAM_NO=DEPARTMENT.NO )AS deptName , (SELECT CHANGE_NAME FROM PROFILE_A WHERE PROFILE_A.MEMBER_NO=MEMBER.NO )AS profileName , position.position AS position , (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM PROFILE_A WHERE PROFILE_A.MEMBER_NO=MEMBER.NO )AS profileNo FROM MEMBER, PROFILE_A, position WHERE POSITION.NO = MEMBER.POSITION_NO
